column1: Local Foods////Came because of the reviews
column2: and I'll likely be back to try other things on the menu. I came for lunch during the weekday around 1
column3: and the parking lot had plenty of space
column4: but the inside was at just about capacity. Â Fortunately while in line
column5: a few tables opened up for myself and my friend. 4 or more people would have had to be creative. There was an interesting mix of people there
column6: from students to older professionals to a whole gaggle of women and their tiny babies.
